name: Text Processor Utilities
description: Helper functions for parsing and logic.
content:
# Text Processor Utilities

Access via `lc.llm.tp`.

```python
# Yes/No Logic
is_spam = lc.llm.tp.yes_no("Is this spam?", context=email_text)

# Summarization
summary = lc.llm.tp.summerize_text(text)

# Extract Code Blocks
blocks = lc.llm.tp.extract_code_blocks(response_text)

# Clean Reasoning
clean = lc.llm.tp.remove_thinking_blocks(response_text)
```
